UK's Cameron vows to protect Falkland IslandsBritish foreign minister David Cameron vowed on Monday to help protect the Falkland Islands as long as they wanted to remain under British control despite attempts by Argentina's new leader to reopen negotiations on their sovereignty. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:28:18 GMT KD544D2QLVMXLEVXO6PCQWVQ5E https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uks-cameron-vows-protect-falkland-islands-2024-02-20/Reuters世界英国
Defeated Indonesian election candidates call for parliamentary probeTwo unsuccessful candidates in last week's Indonesian presidential election have urged parliament to look into complaints of irregularities in the run-up to the event. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:22:44 GMT泽鲁克XFPBN4JJ7KFTLK75FPR4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/defeated-indonesian-election-candidates-call-parliamentary-probe-2024-02-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
Four Egyptian officers back on trial in Italy over Regeni murderThe trial of four Egyptian security agents accused of kidnapping and murdering an Italian student in Cairo resumed on Tuesday after a prolonged delay following questions over the legality of proceedings. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:12:44 GMT MY25OJMPDFKQZBH2SDPDU3EPSM https://www.reuters.com/world/four-egyptian-officers-back-trial-italy-over-regeni-murder-2024-02-20/Reuters世界
Hungary set to ratify Sweden's NATO bid on Feb 26 after long delayHungary's ruling Fidesz party proposed on Tuesday that parliament should vote to ratify Sweden's bid to join NATO on Feb. 26, a move that it would support. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 09:00:35 GMT TU42XXWKTFOEVNOW67IBXSAGYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-set-ratify-swedens-nato-bid-feb-26-after-long-delay-2024-02-20/Boldizsar Gyori世界欧洲
Sweden donates another $680 mln in military aid to UkraineSweden's defence ministry said on Tuesday the Nordic country will donate military aid to Ukraine worth some 7.1 billion Swedish crowns ($682 million), including the transfer of equipment and fresh cash for arms procurement. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 08:56:32 GMT X47D7D6TNJLGNLVGQSNNAXHMY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/sweden-donates-another-680-mln-military-aid-ukraine-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian spy chief: killed Russian pilot was 'moral corpse' for defectingRussia's foreign intelligence chief said on Tuesday that a Russian pilot who defected to Ukraine and was found shot dead in an underground garage in Spain last week was a "moral corpse" when he planned his crimes, Russian news agencies reported. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 08:39:11 GMT I7G4C2L5FNICJN7VBHQKX2LSPI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-spy-chief-killed- Russian-pilot-was-moral-corpse-defecting-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Greek farmers gear up for tractor protest in Athens over rising costsGreek farmers were expected to drive into Athens with tractors on Tuesday to protest outside parliament over rising energy costs, competition from abroad and for extra financial aid to tackle the impact of recent flooding. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 08:36:46 GMT WEQEVXIXNFKDJE2G3Z2RMSZUMA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greek-farmers-gear-up-tractor-protest-athens-over-rising-costs-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
S.Korea forced labour victim receives "compensation" from Japanese firm, family lawyer saysThe family of a South Korean man forced to work for a Japanese company during Japan's 1910-1945 occupation has received money from the Japanese firm he worked for, marking the first time a forced labour victim has secured such funds in a legal case. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 07:57:04 GMT 6A7PRIO7NNPJZM4BBSE7L4U2CU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/skorea-forced-labour-victim-receives-compensation-japanese-firm-family-lawyer-2024-02-20/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Polish farmers to step up protests with total blockade of Ukrainian borderPolish farmers will step up protests on the border with Ukraine on Tuesday, blocking almost all traffic in what they say is a bid to save their livelihoods but which Kyiv says is damaging its war effort. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 07:49:18 GMT SY2OENO4CFPWDAT35QY3UPZEUU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-step-up-protests-with-total-blockade-ukrainian-border-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Chinese tourists flock to Southeast Asia as overseas travel bounces backChinese travellers flocked to tourist hot-spots across Asia over the Lunar New Year break, with visitor numbers and spending in destinations including Singapore, Thailand and Malaysia exceeding pre-COVID levels. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 07:11:31 GMT CSFIQ2TA4FNRTEFXCJ6FRQBZLM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-tourists-flock-southeast-asia-overseas-travel-bounces-back-2024-02-20/Sophie Yu, Anne Marie Roantree世界中国
Russia detains dual US-Russian citizen for treason, TASS cites FSB as sayingRussia's Federal Security Service has detained a woman with dual Russian-U.S. citizenship in the Urals mountain city of Yekaterinburg on suspicion of treason for raising funds for Ukraine's armed forces, the TASS news agency reported. Tue, 20 Feb 2024 06:59:30 GMT V3IERLBQFNMVBHLTNDRVRTBC2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-detains-dual-us- Russian-citizen-treason-tass-cites-fsb-saying-2024-02-20/Reuters世界欧洲
